Bolk6nski noticed the hussar's state of mind, and it amused him. With a slightly contemptu- ous smile, he said: "Yes, there are many stories now told about that affair!" 
"Yes, stories!" repeated Rost6v loudly, look- ing with eyes suddenly grown furious, now at Boris, now at Bolk6nski. "Yes, many stories! But our stories are the stories of men who have been under the enemy's fire! Our stories have some weight, not like the stories of tho
